about_the_game:
About game:



Welcome to Karate Beasts, the ultimate 2D simulation game where you can unleash your inner warrior and become a champion! In this game, you will embark on a thrilling journey to defeat the evil Dark Sensei and rescue your beloved uncle.

You will start your adventure by choosing your beast from a range of options, each with their unique strengths and weaknesses. Then, you will train your beast to hone its skills and prepare for battle. You will have to work hard to develop your beast's abilities, including speed, strength, and agility.

Your ultimate goal is to defeat Dark Sensei's three unbeatable beasts in the ultimate showdown. However, before you can face them, you must first train with three different masters, each specializing in a different type of karate. Master Walid , Master Abu, and Master Papa . Each master will guide you through a series of challenges and help you master their unique style of karate.

Once you have completed your training, you will face Dark Sensei's beasts in an epic battle. Each battle will require you to use all the skills and techniques you have learned to emerge victorious.

If you manage to defeat all three of Dark Sensei's beasts, you will face him in the final showdown. This battle will test your limits, and you must use everything you have learned to emerge victorious. If you win, you will be crowned as the Karate Beasts champion and save your uncle from Dark Sensei's clutches.




Every aspect of your training and fights are simulated for a hyper-realistic experience! In this action-packed game, you will need to carefully balance your power and stamina to emerge victorious in the ring.

As you begin your journey, you will be taken under the wing of three legendary masters, each with their own unique fighting style and expertise. Learn from them, train with them, and become a master of their techniques.

But be warned, the competition is fierce! You will need to use all your training and skills to defeat a wide range of opponents, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. The fights are intense, and every move counts, so make sure to stay focused and maintain your stamina.

As you progress through the game, you will unlock new levels, challenges, and rewards. Build your reputation as a professional and dutiful fighter, and rise to the top of the leaderboards. Will you be the one to claim the championship and cement your place in the hall of fame?

With stunning graphics, realistic sound effects, and immersive gameplay, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat. So what are you waiting for? Step into the arena and begin your journey to become the ultimate fighter



You play as Leo, the most powerful and well-trained fighter, and your mission is to help him become the ultimate champion of the game.

But the journey won't be easy. With a range of challenging stages and levels to conquer, you'll need to stay focused and hone your skills to emerge victorious. And that's just the beginning - once you've completed all the levels, you'll face off against the ultimate foe - Dark Sensei, the villain who has caused Leo's family to lose their pride, honor, and reputation.

To defeat Dark Sensei and help Leo take revenge, you'll need to bring all your experience and expertise to the ring. But with Leo's dream of earning the title of Karate Beast on the line, you'll stop at nothing to ensure his victory



Your journey starts with normal matches, where you'll get a chance to test your skills against other fighters and develop new techniques to add to your arsenal.

As you progress through the game, you'll face increasingly tough challenges in the form of tournament fights. With 15 tournaments to conquer, each with a varying number of matches ranging from 3 to 15, you'll need to stay focused and maintain your stamina to emerge victorious.

But the real challenge lies in the final showdown against the beast of dark sensei. This legendary fighter is known for his unbeatable skills and is the ultimate test of your fighting abilities. Can you defeat him and claim the title of the ultimate Karate Beast?

But the journey doesn't end there. With 11 different beasts to choose from, each with their unique set of skills, you can continue to train and level up your beasts to become an unbeatable fighting force. The more you play, the more powerful your beasts will become, and the closer you'll get to earning the title of Karate Beast.





Features:

  • Karate Beast is an offline 2D game.
  • Players have unlimited lives to beat the evil.
  • 3 trainers/masters for training that offers different exercises for training
  • There are 11 characters, players can choose according to their choice.
  • There are 15 tournaments.
  • Each tournament has a set of matches and there is a final battle.
  • You can choose the Master and Your Beast of your choice.


Karate Beast, the most difficult game you will ever play! With your own unique character to play, you'll have the power to unleash devastating attacks and defeat your opponents easily. But beware - the road to victory is not easy, and you will have to train and feed your beast to make it the ultimate fighting machine.

So what are you waiting for? Download "Karate Beast" now and get ready to unleash your combat skills in the ultimate battle against evil!!!!
